reviewText: This book has been a life saver.  I never expected it to give me so much hope in discovering more of who the Lord truly is.
A must read for those are wish to draw closer to God. This is easy to read and easy to apply to our daily lives!!!

This did not only cover the contents of his book, it expanded on his own experience in the secret place of prayer! Very moving, encouraging and, if you haven't been compelled before, it will draw you into the relationship we are all called to have with our Savior, Jesus.
